ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T22:13:52 [Issue ID 4000-67000] urn:comicvine:4000-67000 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 03:31:51. [Issue ID 86116]
ComicInfo.Summary: Crossfire: Anti-ultrahuman The Pilgrim tries to recruit Theodoric into his gang, but Theodoric, still unused to his newly found sentience inside the Teknight II armor, refuses. Helped by Firearm and Freex, Night Man battles Rafferty‘s soldiers. Firearm gets a call from Rafferty telling him that he killed Prime.
ComicInfo.Title: Crossfire
ComicInfo.Colorist: Tim Divar,Violent Hues,Ruth Yasharpour,Tim Divar,Violent Hues,Ruth Yasharpour
